Huiothesia is a genuine adoption with adjudication to the adopted child of the same status as that of child of the family, including the right to inherit. The available documents are not evidence of the Roman vulgar law (H.J.Wolff): huiothesia signifies "die volksrechtliche Adoption" (R. Taubenschlag).
